name: Playback (Dyoxyne, Casey Urso, Nielisson, gizhaie)
description:
Playback

Everyone in town is looking for something to brighten up their day. With the help of your cassette recorder, you can record and rewind the sounds that people need to turn their moods around!

Notes:

  • Walk around town to find the unique sights, sounds, and people of your home town.
  • Capture these sounds onto your trusty cassette recorder.
  • Rewind the sounds for the right people to brighten up their mood.

Made entirely in one week for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2.
